extendedInfo.description: The genre-defining 3D Tower Defense game, Defense Technica! Think you know tower defense? Think again.Experience a new kind of Defense game with Defense Technica, featuring stunning 3D graphics and ground-breaking new features like path rotation, tower construction, tower upgrades, and card collection and combination! You can play Defense Technica in English, Deutsch, franÃ§ais, íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æç®ä½, or ä¸­æç¹é«.Tablets supported!Want to enjoy Defense Technica on a big screen? No problem! Download Defense Technica on your tablet now!FEATURESPath Rotation & Tower Building- Build towers in strategic places to defend against incoming enemies, and rotate paths.- Upgrade towers to increase striking power against the waves of incoming enemies.- Defeat enemies to receive a variety of resources to upgrade your tower.Collect & Combine Tower Cards- Use the special upgrade card system to create your own unique cards and upgrades.- Sell or combine unwanted cards to get new cards.Ether Repair & Attack Items- Later stages and waves have stronger enemies and continuous attacks.- Use Ether items to annihilate enemies and to repair your core. * Follow Com2uS on Twitter for the latest game updates! http://twitter.com/com2us* This is a singleplayer game. reviews.title: Boring a lot
reviews.comment: Handles is soso. Graphics maybe great, but without good story it is pointless. Gets boring in 5 minutes. Not recommended for from lovers.  Play Kingdom Rush instead.
reviews.author: Evgeniy Nevskiy

reviews.title: Nice graphic but
reviews.comment: There\'s a lot of room for improvement. Huge lag and sometimes on certain level with flying enemies it doesn\'t get rendered. Only way to get it to shown is by pausing and exit to main menu and resume. Weird bug
reviews.author: Andrew de Silva

reviews.title: Nice idea
reviews.comment: Good game, has some nice features to change up the gameplay, not perfect tho few glitches that need to ironed out but overall pretty good
reviews.author: Tom Honour

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome game, but would like it if the towers were upgradeable after the 1st stage and the machine gun towers were a little stronger - also, I WANT MORE LEVELS! Give me more levels and the things I asked for and you shall have your 5 star rating
reviews.author: Ryan Cameron

reviews.comment: Just started playing. Seems to be user-friendly.
reviews.author: Darryl Suchomel

reviews.title: Clunky but cool.
reviews.comment: Menu navigation slow and clunky. Probably another minimum effort port from ios version.
reviews.author: John Boyer Jr

reviews.comment: excellent product with lots of depth. Some of the later endless levels are a bit buggy though.\tlove the 3d update to tower defense with the added ability to manipulate the enemy path Nice game! well executed 3d with good use of terrain blocking tactics. Only 4 missions in at this point but it looks like a winner!
reviews.author: michael wikan

reviews.title: Glitch needs resolving. Otherwise quite good.
reviews.comment: Theres a glitch that needs patching in the next update. sometimes wen u place a tower down a blue pixelated mist appears where the enemies spawn but no enemies appear even though its not paused and the progress bar at bottom continues to move. Sort the problem out and you will have your five star rating. Otherwise a really gud game be a shame to let it down by not resolving the issue.
reviews.author: Zeben Hurlock

reviews.title: Excellent, when it works
reviews.comment: This game has been supremely frustrating, because when it works, it\'s great - it just doesn\'t seem to work all that often.  It was working, but after the last update, just gets stuck after about a half dozen waves of incoming enemies (like the ship that delivers them gets caught in a loop).  Would rate much higher if it were stable.
reviews.author: Don Yeske

reviews.title: Good play
reviews.comment: Great graphic and gameplay
reviews.author: Rafael Johnson

reviews.title: Very addictive
reviews.comment: Very nifty TD game ive ever played. Could use more ways of earning crystals and starting an endless. Very hard at first.
reviews.author: Oscar Sanchez

reviews.title: So far JUST OK
reviews.comment: Had to reboot tablet once already. Game is nice. We\'ll see how isolated this remains.
reviews.author: Charles Stiegler

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Kinda hard but fun.
reviews.author: Alex Dinan

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Interesting game play enjoyed it immensely
reviews.author: Ronald Keene

reviews.title: Glithes
reviews.comment: Glitches in some maps and maybe increase in the ratio of crystals earn in endless mode would be better..
reviews.author: Lim Kimhoe

reviews.title: Broken again
reviews.comment: Sigh
reviews.author: Rafael Belinky

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: good
reviews.author: HImchan Choi

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Good play
reviews.author: Stephen Perry

reviews.title: CherryMobileW500Titan
reviews.comment: Doesnt work, cant connect, force closes. Fix this, i\'ll change my rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Plz fix crash issues game seems the crash every lvl from 5 and up
reviews.author: William Lee
